metadata.Plot: When an EVP inherits a manor, he's expected to host his family for Christmas. Since he doesn't have time or Christmas spirit, he hires an event planner. As Merry decorates and plans, she wins him over and helps him love Christmas again.
metadata.Actors: Joe Kurak, Eliza Roberts, Julia Yorks
